channel.title: Morning Mail
channel.description: Stay updated on the latest news and events happening in the RPI community.

item.title: ASCE Student Chapter Meeting
item.description: Date: Thursday, February 19, 2026 6:00 PM - 7:00 PM - Interested in civil/structural engineering and historical preservation? Join other students for this presentation by Engineering Ventures. Learn about their projects, intern opportunities, and general career advice. Pizza will be provided
item.author: Students

item.title: SP26 Final Semester - Now What? Immigration
item.description: Friday, February 20, 2026 4:00 AM - 5:00 AM - ATTENTION INTERNATIONAL STUDENTS Join ISSS for a virtual workshop to learn about the immigration options for life after graduation. Topics include employment, continuing your studies, departing the U.S., and more. Online (Webex) event on Friday, February 20, 2026 from 4:00 p.m. - 5:00 p.m. REGISTRATION IS REQUIRED, AT: https://bit.ly/final-semester-SP2026 Contact: Reba Cappelli, 518-276-4966, capper@rpi.edu
item.author: Students

item.title: Milan Olympics Watch Party
item.description: Date: Thursday, February 19, 2026 8:30 AM - 4:30 PM - Whether you’re a sports enthusiast or just looking for a lively community event, join us at the Milan Olympics Watch Party to witness the world’s best compete in the Winter Olympics! This event is Thursday, February 19 in the Union Theater from 8:30 a.m. to 4:00 p.m. (EST). Hosted by International Services for Students and Scholars (ISSS), the Rensselaer Union, and RecWell.
item.author: Community

item.title: Mercer X Project Management Q&A Seminar and Hands-on Workshop with Monica Johns (TTM Technologies)
item.description: Come to our Mercer X Scrum/Agile Project Management Q&A Session (Friday, February 20th) and/or Hands-on Workshop (Saturday, February 21st) with Monica Johns (TTM Technologies)! We have Sticky notes, Poster paper, a Mercer XLab dynamic workspace, and a veteran project management professional to help organize your projects. Join us for an engaging, hands-on workshop designed to introduce (or deepen) your understanding of Scrum and Agile methodologies from Project Management. BYOP!
item.author: Community

item.title: Rensselaer Faculty and Staff Webinar - Strategies on Flipping Your Classroom
item.description:
Date: Tuesday, February 24, 2026 11:00 AM - 12:00 PM - This session will discuss the practice of moving traditional in-class lectures onto the web by creating engaging, media-rich content that student’s access before, during, or after class. Class time is refocused, allowing students to work on tasks and problems that apply the concepts they studied independently. Please register using the Event URL in the See section of the calendar event.

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
item.author: Faculty and Staff
